website_summaries.verdict: Not your father's Lawn-Boy — though it's recognized for the ability to start with little effort, it lacks the build and reliability of past generations of this iconic brand.
pros: Has Lawn-Boy parts and Kohler engine — two popular names in lawn care
Starts easily, and if it doesn't, the manufacturer backs it with a 2-pull guarantee
cons: The self-propelled action isn't as powerful as others on our list
Some users found it couldn't tackle hills and inclines
Some components, including parts of the wheels, are made of plastic that doesn't feel very durable

customer_reviews.title: Terribly designed deck with nut heads and a rim that ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected when buying a lawn-boy. Don't think about cutting even damp let alone wet grass. Terribly designed deck with nut heads and a rim that catches grass cuttings and bogs down mower. Giving it one star for the engine that does start with one pull and for the easy height adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 pull and running
customer_reviews.text: this is the best starting mower I've ever used, UPS dropped it off, I tore into the box, pulled out an awesome looking mower, installed the handle and grass catcher, checked all the nuts and bolts, filled it up with oil that was supplied in the box and poured in some gas, pulled the rope one time and she fired right up....mows great too :) easy to maneuver, not too heavy, it is a fine mower but I still hate to mow LOL
customer_reviews.author: Willie McDaries

customer_reviews.title: Worst mower I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Mower is almost a push mower. It's Soo weak I have to help it along by pushing . The wheels are entirely Too Small and Thin to enable the thing to get a firm grip on the lawn. The deck sits Soo Low that it literally scrapes the grass and causes Way too much drag even on the highest blade position. All of these problems cause the engine to overwork and almost Stall on my lawn. There is No Side Discharge As Advertised making the mower mulch without the clipping bag attached - adding Again to the mower's inefficiency. The mower does not start on the first try either. I'm Totally UNHAPPY with this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Mower deck cracked in two places after light use.
customer_reviews.text: We've had this mower for just over two years (just past the warranty period), and the mower deck has serious cracks in two places. Wrote to Lawn-Boy - got the canned "Thanks for contacting us" response, and no resolution. Have a look at the pics and make your own decision before purchasing this mower. I've been cutting grass for 50 years and never seen a mower fail in this fashion. We've got a small Florida yard, grass over sand, with no rocks or other obstacles. Used the mower for maybe 100 hours.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cains

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware of Package Purchases on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lawn mower for my son's birthday which he really loves. However, Amazon included a package suggestion to include a gas can and oil as shown on the picture I attached. My son reviewed the lawn mower manual and this 2 state oil cannot be used for this mower. Please review all suggestions as they may not be as useful as suggestion as Amazon suggests.
customer_reviews.author: r rey longoria

customer_reviews.title: Makes lawn work easy for an old (make that older) lady!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new mower. It is easy for this over 60 woman to maneuver ( definitely need the self-propelled feature ). It is so easy to start and keep going with the keyed starter. I tried pulling the cord to start the mower and was totally unsuccessful. That would only work for someone with a strong arm and healthy constitution, so I'll not try it again! Along with my Black and Decker weed trimmer, I am able to keep my lawn looking as good as the neighbors (who use a lawn service)
customer_reviews.author: marshnello

customer_reviews.title: I’m impressed
customer_reviews.text: In your description of this mower, you say that it will start in the first or second pull. I didn’t believe you. I figured I’d end up asking someone else to start it as I do with my other lawn tools. It has started in the first pull every time. I’m 66 and not strong like I used to be, but I haven’t asked for help setting this up or starting it. It was packed so well that I did have to get a saw to cut through two heavy duty cardboard boxes to unpack it. It was worth the effort to get a damage free mower.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lawnmower 6 months ago. It hasn't even been used 12 times. It stopped working all of a sudden even though my husband has made sure to follow the guidelines for upkeep. My husband took it to a Lawnboy representative, Austin Outdoor Power, and they would not service the lawnmower I bought through Amazon. Our lawnmower is only 6 months old and doesn't work. We called Amazon and were told to contact Lawnboy even though we talked with an authorized dealer for Lawnboy who refused to honor the warranty. The dealer said Amazon is not an authorized seller. I do not recommend buying this lawnmower unless you don't mind having to pay for repairs out of pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne J

customer_reviews.title: In the shop 4 times first season.
customer_reviews.text: Lawn boy used to be a good name. This unit was in the shop 4 times the first year ( under warranty EXCEPT for one time). Factory service center said it was junk. The mower would kick up a twig or piece of mulch and jamb the belt so it wouldn't move. Last time they charged me even though it was still in the first season. That's not why you buy a "new" mower.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working during first mow
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working halfway through the first mow! We checked everything and couldn't find anything right away. It was under a warranty so we went to their site and called all their "servicers" and not one of them actually serviced this mower. My husband went online and found out that this mower was known for this kind of problem. The problem was the sparkplug. It wasn't bad, but it gets clogged or dirty easily and needs to be cleaned. For your first mow, do it at the highest setting - that will help keep it from getting dirty. Amazon was great about exchanges/refunds. We've used it since and it's worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Granger

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The self-propelled function stopped working on my fourth time mowing our yard. I took it to the proper shop to get it repaired since it was obviously under warranty. They found that a belt was the problem, but this is not covered since it is a part that wears out (after 4 trips around a small yard?). So-- I am out an additional $154.00. I think this is turning into a very expensive mower.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Fan

customer_reviews.title: It is a self-propelled powerful gas powered mower with a bag and in my opinion this is the best option considering the price
customer_reviews.text: People have had problems with this mower because of some malfunction in the upper right wheel causing it to not be adjustable to the blade length of the grass however this had no impact on me and in fact I can change the cutting length of the mower with no problem at all so I think it was a malfunction for certain versions of this. It is a self-propelled powerful gas powered mower with a bag and in my opinion this is the best option considering the price. I would buy a ride-on mower if I could but this has been great it does exactly what I hoped
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Ease of start..that’s why I bought a key style..and paid extra but so far it has been a 50% key start.50% pull start??!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very hard time getting the battery to charge..the wiring leaves A LOT to be desired..looks like something from a kids toy, a $3.00 toy! So afraid it would pull apart does not fit easily. Would give 4 stars for how it mows..but again the wheels are a hard plastic and do a LOT of spinning!! Trying to figure a way to give them more grip??? Overall it will do the job but could be much better made....
customer_reviews.author: joan e mcgreevy

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as it is advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new mower. I even got rid of a brand new Honda HR series mower, for the Lawnboy. This mower started the first time right out of the box, and has started the first time each I used it. It is lightweight and very easy to maneuver. The self-propelled feature is very easy to use, and the speed can be adjusted very easily by just bringing the bar to the handle. It cuts the grass well, and in my case I only mulch, so I wont be using the bagger. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Discharge not included, mulching not great
customer_reviews.text: Cuts grass fine. Disappointed that this is advertised as having side discharge but doesn’t come with the discharge chute and has to be acquired separately. At least be honest in the product description. It should function as advertised out of the box or buyers should be notified. Although apparently many mower manufacturers are doing this.... Mulching feature doesn’t seem to work very well and clogs easily. We bought the “3-in-1” so we wouldn’t have to bag, but have been bagging until we get this fixed. Will try another reviewer suggestion of raising front wheels higher than the back to improve the mulching function.
customer_reviews.author: DeLana

customer_reviews.title: The front wheel height adjustment arm will not stay in ...
customer_reviews.text: The front wheel height adjustment arm will not stay in place after about 30 to 40 minutes out of the box. The only way to keep the front wheel height adjuster in place was to use a pair of vice grip pliers to lock the arm in place. The front height adjustment arm seems to be the primary problem I have had with the mower but the self-propelled function seems to be a little weak. If you get into a area that is a little steep or into a heavy grass area, you will have to help it along. I have COPD and the main reason for purchasing a self-propelled mower was to not having to push the mower.
customer_reviews.author: phillip o. calloway

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. The engine was not strong enough for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. The engine was not strong enough for my yard, the 'self propelled' feature initially worked well, but but failed by the second season. Also, before the second season, it would not even start until the temperature was at least into the mid or upper 80's. I have been totally frustrated with this this mower since the first Summer ended. Amazon DID refund my full purchase price after I called in and explained I could not even get the thing to start. Buy something else!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Under-powered, hard to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Easily plugs up in deep grass and does not eject the clippings efficiently. Bogs down in moderate or deep grass port to bagger clogs up easily. The battery cover broke off the third time I used the mower. The bottom flap guard on the rear makes it difficult to pull back. Electric starter under powered, must be over low or no grass to start. Self propelled speed is too fast for me to walk behind and hard to control. I am 71 and I do not recommend this mower for older people or younger people either. My 11 year old grandson has difficulty maneuvering it and I bought it for him to help me out.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I got the unit today and had it cutting grass in 35 minutes. Great motor, great power, great turning, powerful self-propelled. BUT, the only fault was that the rear door did not fit the grass catcher perfectly at the top. The door was slightly bowed--a manufacturing defect, and it did not seal firmly to the bag, SO THAT grass clippings exited out the top of the door. The ejected grass did not hit my face but the small misfitting gap is not acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aona

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lawnmower. I've never owned a Lawn Boy before and didn't realize they had switched to 4-cycle engines but its of no matter. I got the electric start mainly because I needed a mower ASAP. The rear wheel drive took some getting use to but it's simply a matter of remembering to turn loose of the drive when pulling it backward and making sharp turns. I have no reservations at all about this machine.
customer_reviews.author: SamC130

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower for a small-ish yard
customer_reviews.text: Just finished the maiden voyage with this mower, and I really like it. Easy assembly. Lightweight. Easy to start. Easy to maneuver. Self-propulsion works fairly well (needs a bit more power on slopes). Biggest issue? The Dadgum bagger keeps wanting to fall off. Needs a locking mechanism. It’s a Koehler engine, so I actually expected it to flush the grass clippings. 😂 All in all, 4+ stars. Do wish I gotten a larger deck width.
customer_reviews.author: rnasnzman

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE..
customer_reviews.text: My review is simple. DONT BUY THIS LAWNMOWER! Purchased 1 year and 1 month ago. For the price of this mower go ahead a get something where the battery comes out and can be recharged. I have now ordered 3 batteries that amazon said was compatible with this mower ($20 to $45 each) NONE OF THEM FIT! Returns are a big hassle. A lot of effort was put in to the choice of mower and each battety. Amazon also assisted in the choosing of battery #3. Everything is a failure.
customer_reviews.author: blainevonharden

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap. Ever since it was new the wheel height ...
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap. Ever since it was new the wheel height adjusters kept falling off. Lawn Boy customer service is horrible. The grass catcher does not fit tight at the top so grass blows right in your face. Does have a Honda engine so maybe I'll take that off and throw the deck in the junk yard or ship it back to Lawn Boy.Just bought this in December so I used it 4 times. Good Luck.
customer_reviews.author: David W Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Wheel off!
customer_reviews.text: The lawn mower arrived quickly and we closely followed all directions the were supplied. As we were using the lawn mower for the first time the front axel fell off breaking the adjustment lever. We scoured the directions for anything at all related to the wheels or axels. After not finding any help there we were able to put enough pressure on the axel to get it to snap in place. Mower worked after that but I'm keeping my fingers crossed we don't have any other unpleasant surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. K

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: This mower didn't work out of the box; the motor is apparently not centered on the frame and the blade strikes the frame. I had to grind about 1/8" off the blade before I could start it. And the grass catcher falls off occasionally. And if you push up on the handle while it's running it makes an unsettling sound. I haven't determined what's causing that yet but from the sound of it the answer can't be far away. In the '60's Lawnboy was an excellent mower but this is not your father's Lawnboy.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Harris

customer_reviews.title: Key start is fantastic. Lots of power, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the key start on this! Saves my back so much strain, starts on the 1st try 90% of the time, doesn't need to charge much in between. Lightweight, easy to adjust the wheel height, lots of power. Took me awhile to get used to only holding the power bar part of the way (it's too fast for me all the way in), but now it's natural. Easy to tilt and turn, bag works well, too. Overall, really pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Cincy Mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this lawnmower!
customer_reviews.text: If anything goes wrong in the first two years you have to work with Lawnboy to get it covered under the manufactures warranty which covers defects only. They don't pay for you to take the mower in to be looked at. And will not cover anything. Their customer service staff at 800-526-6937 merely repeat themselves. Don't waste your time. I bought this mower because it was manufactured in Minnesota and I wanted to buy local. It had good reviews. I'm sorry I ever wasted my time and money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Ann K. Farley

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this one
customer_reviews.text: The front wheels are very fragile. They will break off if not extremely careful. The mower won't hot start. If you have been mowing for over 3 minutes and you need to stop the mower will not restart for 5 or more minutes.- I can't recommend the mower. Very disappointed with it. I would return it if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible designed obsolescence
customer_reviews.text: Simple manual choke for a lawnmower has been replaced with a supposed self regulating choke. It broke with in 1st mowing, alas due to Covid-19 by the time I could try and return, the Amazon time was passed. POS Do Not BUY!@!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe their 3 year True Start Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Having used the absolute minimum amount of gas to avoid their "Stale Gas" issue, I was on the second tank of gas with stabilizer during the third mow when it died and then failed to start, but already they are trying to find reasons to NOT honor their "True Start Warranty". And there are NO authorized warranty repair dealers within 200 miles of where I live despite what it shows on their website. Checked their website and saw 20 dealers highlighted and I called every one of them but each and every one of them said they are not authorized warranty repair dealers.
customer_reviews.author: Secret MonkeyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: On the positive side, it has a lot of power and starts right up. On the negative side, the wheel adjustment is flimsy. The wheels are too small and it's hard to pull it back. Though I've only had it a month and a half, the paint on the underside of the mower deck is already coming off. It's very hard to clean the grass out. I bought it because it had a lot of positive reviews and I had a Lawn Boy years and years ago. It lasted about 15 years and was a great lawn mower. I am very disappointed in this lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: My mistake that I didn't get the powered drive wheels...
customer_reviews.text: If you jack up the cutting height, it pushes across the yard very easily, even in the uneven conditions of my yard. If this shipped with the bolts to put the handle on, I couldn't find them, and ended up buying carriage bolts from Ace hardware to get everything together. Other than that, it's a great Honda engine with a green cutting deck. I'm a Lawn-Boy boy.
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: Great value for key start and cuts great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to just go out and start with a key instead of cranking it. The speed is adjustable with the lever so it goes at your pace. Very easy to assemble. The weight is about 60 lbs so it's a little bulky to pick up but not bad. Starts, cuts, looks, and works great
customer_reviews.author: rich n seffner

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed expensive mistake
customer_reviews.text: I have used this mower twice now and It does not run right, changed the gas and the oil, mowed or tried to mow my flat small lawn that is dry and all I can say is that it took patience to get the job done. I have it set on the highest setting and pushing slow the engine sputters and quits very easy. The electric start works good as have to use often. I didn't want to get the CA emissions was afraid it would cut down on power but this is ridiculous. Just found out nearest repair place is 60 miles away so sorry have to have repair after using twice.
customer_reviews.author: MimiMick

customer_reviews.title: Catch all (not)
customer_reviews.text: Starts great. Is self-propelled. Only need to fill the oil - no need to change it...very nice. Great value. My 4-star review is result of the bagging. When I mow I bag the clippings. This bag doesn't fit right. There's a lot that falls out when removing it. It's not a deal breaker but it prevents my opinion from giving it a 5-star review. I'd recommend it for the value but know that it either mulches or bags the clippings (with only a rear discharge) and there will be several handfuls of clippings you'll have to pick up after removing the bag.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with a bad back or disabilities
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad back and knee and push mowers are too painful for me to use. This self propelled mower is a dream. It's easy to use, maneuver and uses little gas. Cuts like a dream and no more aching back after mowing my big yard.
customer_reviews.author: The Artist

customer_reviews.title: This lawn mower takes all the work out of cutting your grass!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this to replace my 30 year old Lawn-Boy. Most unbelievable lawnmower I've ever seen. All you have to do is walk behind it and stear it.. that's a lot to say for 5000 square feet with steep hills. The directions are so easy to follow! So far I have used it 4 times. And....this is a 72 year old lady!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Hellebusch

customer_reviews.title: Plastic!
customer_reviews.text: Should be pulled off market immediately! People will get hurt from this mower! Plastic front wheel mount has major design problem. Plastic! Plastic! Plastic! What happened to lawn boy, they were always know for safe reliable machine but this is a joke right!? I must be able to send back and get a different model as this one will hurt people.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ann Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower was hard to start from the first use. Once it started it was ok until I stopped mowing. Then the same thing over again. I would have to wait about an hour or more before it would start again. So I called amazon and asked what to do. They very quickly issued me a credit for the mower and I didn’t have to ship the mower back. I ended up purchasing another brand and it turned out ok but I would not buy a lawnboy again.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived with issues - would not run reliably
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived (August 2018) with issues. After running for several minutes, the engine shut down. Since then, it has never run consistently and reliably. Will probably have to take it somewhere for service. Supposedly it has a 2 year warranty, but we'll see how that works out. I reserve the right to revise this review if the issues work out satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Day Veaster

customer_reviews.title: I like it as I have shrunk down the size of ...
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and there were a couple mentions about this not starting after being run for a while. Not for me. It needs a couple pulls at times but starts and runs well. I will say that the self-propelled feature is somewhat weak. But then, my last mower was a Honda 4.5 hp which could probably fly a small plane. I like it as I have shrunk down the size of my lawn and this will get in between plantings and is a breeze to manipulate due to its comparative lightness. How long it will be problem free is always the question.
customer_reviews.author: A. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Good Machine!
customer_reviews.text: Six star product! Even with my own "Operator Error" it's a great mower. I made an attachment to the speed control that gives me even better range of speed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hatton

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Leaves seem to blow out the deck front
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Leaves seem to blow out the deck front, no matter if bagging or mulching, nor the height setting ( no reviews on that topic yet that I saw). Minimal grass left uncut, rear wheel drive was a selling point for me. I miss the sound and feel of the Lawn Boys of days gone by - 32:1 fuel, offset front wheels, side discharge, free-wheel rear axle when drive disengaged, and the unmistakable engine sound. We never had to repair them, totally indestructable. Hope this new one doesn't disappoint. If it does, too bad for "new & improved". Plastic doesn't always replace steel.
customer_reviews.author: VTop

customer_reviews.title: just OK  power.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It cuts my very thick lawn well. Its light and maneuverable. It sips gas. Cons: Self-propelled speed is low. one lever to adjust the front height and another for the rear is just stupid. Biggest issue: It wont' pull itself up my 30 degree sloped lawn, It needs to be pushed. It's just too weak, it will go up my driveway without a problem but nor in the grass. Overall, decent for flat yards.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Out of the box and running in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: First pull of cord out of box it started, WOW. Added oil, gas and put on handle which took a few minutes and it was running. Do not care for how to adjust the speed of the self propel, kinda a bad design as I am still fussing with getting the right speed for me. I would definately buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great mower and price
customer_reviews.text: The Kohler engine starts on first pull and has plenty of power .The mower is lightweight and is easy to maneuver. It does very good mulching and bag is easy to work with. Customer service was great, as a small plastic part was broken during shipping, the lady was very helpful and I got part in 2 days. I am very pleased with this mower, lawn is 3/4 acre.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love it and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Runs like a charm straight out of the box! Ordered it and two days later delivered!! We needed a new mower soon as possible!! It’s a very good machine and we have a VERY large yard! Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived new in box missing the handle parts. Call ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived new in box missing the handle parts. Call Lawnboy CS and they say it will take 10 days to receive a $.10 bolt and nut. So I improvise with a temp bolt from my collection and begin to set it up. I have owned 2 lawn boy push mowers that lasted 25 years. The wheel height mechanisms are PLASTIC junk and when you set them the mower falls back down scarfing the grass badly. This Lawn Boy won't last 25 hours without problems. NOT the Lawn Boy I remember. Sending it back for refund. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to use mower ever!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. It starts easily, the speed is adjustable just by squeezing more or less on the bar. The bag holds more than any other mower I’ve used, and the mower is light weight enough to easily move into it’s parking spot. I’m 80 yrs old and pulling a starter rope is impossible for me. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: fixer

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this lawnmower for 5 years now. It has never given me any issues! It starts right up with one or two pulls max. The large rear wheels make it very maneuverable and easy to use. I love the mulch bag which is easy to put on and take off. Eventually, the rubber flap in the rear tore but I’d say it was due more to the lawnmower being pulled backwards than anything else. I’ll get a replacement flap.
customer_reviews.author: R. Diago

customer_reviews.title: mower needs re worked. also better customer service  amazon could give them a lesson in service. i think amazon should ban lawn
customer_reviews.text: First up dirt in fuel line not from the fuel i added. took to shop i had to pay shop said lawn boy not to cover. front wheel adjustment all plastic and failed, tried to get service from lawn boy and they said they would call right back. still waiting. this is a failed part from there design they should make it right. i had lawn boy mowers for many years with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Silver

customer_reviews.title: Best Lawnmower Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lawnmower it has to be the best one I've ever used. I didn't think that I needed all the extra features that this one had to offer but now that I have them I wouldn't go back to a standard lawnmower. This thing is just awesome, the electric starter is a life saver on those hot summer days, I don't miss pull-starting in 100+ degrees! Anyways, if you're in the market for a lawnmower, lawn-boy is the way to go you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: ThaDizzleMan

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After the third use, the mower would no longer continue running when started. Using a wire-tie to force open the the choke temporarily resolved the issue. However, after being stored for the season, the mower will no longer even start. Warranty/guarantee is useless as there are no service centers near me. In comparison, a cheap mower bought at the same time for a different location has not experienced any issues despite seeing far more use. Although I have never given anything a 1 star review, the Lawn-Boy has earned it since its incapable of performing the function is it designed for.
customer_reviews.author: A.C. TINNEY

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend it to a friend!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Fairly lightweight. Well powered. Easy to start. The cutting height adjustments is a real nice feature. Smaller compact and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: YesReally

customer_reviews.title: All Around Great Mower
customer_reviews.text: I needed an electric start due to my advanced age, and this mower met my need very well. This mower does not quite maneuver the way my previous Lawn Boy did, but it really is not bad at all. The way this mower chops up long grass and leaves no trail is really outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: David P. Kuske

customer_reviews.title: short life span on these......
customer_reviews.text: Suitable just for my lawn mowing person at the right price (approx. $299.00). previous lawnboy: Electric start failed shortly after warranty expired. Belt went off track under warranty, but dealer charged me $35.00 for repair telling me he could care less about warranty work unless the co (TORO) paid him a $100.00. Lawnboy answer to complaint was to drive 80 miles round trip for warranty work. Now I have spare parts!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D Davison sr

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s Ok but my yard isn’t flat I’ve had problems restarting after stopping if it isn’t on level ground. I pul at least 5-6 times to get it to start disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assembly, fill with oil that was supplied, charge the battery overnight. The self propelled is more of a "assist", still needs more effort to push the mower than expected, drive system LACKS power. Any type of incline you will need to push the mower. The electric start is well thought out....easy access to connector to charge and also easy to get to battery. Over all lighter and easy to maneuver, well see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good mower. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great lawn mower. Lightweight, starts easy, mows well. Height mechanism works fine too. The catcher is a good design and the mower ejects cut grass into it well. I dont miss the side grass exit at all. The gas cap is big, strong and should hold up well. Frankly, I was worried after reading some of the negative reviews but was surprized happily with the performance and looks of this inexpensive mower. I did have to adjust the cable sleeve back in its clamp for the clutch drive lever to get good engagement of the drive mechanism and I dont consider it a problem, just normal tuning.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad mower!
customer_reviews.text: I have mowed 4 times with this mower now. It starts on first pull, the height adjustment has not varied and I have learned how the self propelled bar works. Frankly, I like tjis mower a lot.
customer_reviews.author: J the Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Ok if your lawn is a circle
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used lawn boys for 30yrs.My old one(scamp) is in need of some carb work so wife decided I deserved a new oneLMAO.Anyways I bought this one and it’s just mediocre.Cant pull it backwards EASILY.Its a mulching mower so if you raise mower to turn it spews out grass clumps everywhere.Mess!So I keep it down and try to slide it around curves.The handle stays in one position?My old one has travel it it which is great for going up and down a gully or ditch.This stays put and you have to bend over to far.I can’t wait til my SCAMP is repaired so I can sell this one on CL for 200$
customer_reviews.author: Mark D

customer_reviews.title: Lawnboy THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned a Lawnboy all our lives. This replaced our 12 year old Lawnboy and is an exceptional mower. The one thing we didn't like was re-attaching the bag after emptying. It can be a little tricky if you don't get it in just right. Otherwise we wouldn't trade a Lawnboy for any other mower. The self propelled mower is very powerful and you can mow at fast or slow walking speed depending on how far you depress the self propel handle. Cuts a beautiful swath and leaves your lawn looking professional.
customer_reviews.author: RDB

customer_reviews.title: exceptional for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional for the price. I can always start it and load it in and out of my pickup. And I am a lanky woman! Exactly what I needed. I do property preservation work and this mower is holding up to commercial use. Just wrapping up second mowing season with no issues. Started second pull this spring after sitting out in Montana winter with light cover. Clean the air filter a little more often when mowing dry and dusty areas. Which most homeowners won't be doing anyway. Very happy with this purchase. Edit to add: Just fired this thing up straight out of my garage this spring. That's three years of exceptionally hard use and irresponsible storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Good As It Gets
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Lawnboy. The first was durable and easy to operate. The second one is amazing. Lawnboy guarantees a start on first pull and that is exactly what has happened in over 30 start. Good value!
customer_reviews.author: John C. Waisath

customer_reviews.title: Great running a little fast
customer_reviews.text: Great running start up is easy my wife uses it with know problems . The self propel is a little fast you can slow it down by not pulling the lever to the handle. I installed a rubber block on the grab handle so it will not go to full speed more comfortable to bottom the speed lever on a block than to hold it in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Cut lawn every week - not meant for tall grass.
customer_reviews.text: It works and I appreciate not having to pull the dang cord. It's not meant for tall grass - the mower doesn't "throw" the cuttings to the side so cutting tall grass might cause it to get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: N. G. Cofresi

customer_reviews.title: Do more research...
customer_reviews.text: Convience of electric starter is only thing that is pro on this machine... self proppel drive works but it does not run it time to time. Machine stops frrquently for emptying cut grass... too many times... seems under powered machine.
customer_reviews.author: Young O Kim

customer_reviews.title: Has slick back on tires, no traction
customer_reviews.text: I had 3 lawnboys over 30 yrs span, i have thick soya grass, every other lawn boy came with agessive wheels, never had a oroblem getting thru the grass. The mower has slicks on the back. This mower cant get out of its own way. Very disapointed in this mowers response, needs much more agressive tires to get thru the grass.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT STRAUB

customer_reviews.title: lawn boy Rocks
customer_reviews.text: I received lawnmower on time, took out of Box read directions and had it assembled in about 45 mins. It came with 1/2 quart of oil and I had gas. I mowed same day. Blade was Sharp! One knock is wheel axial are not as sturdy as I hoped but they are not terrible. just looks like they tried to plastic it up!.. But the axials are not terrible. My old 6.25 Lawn boy was indestructible so my frame of reference is slightly old school.
customer_reviews.author: sdewitty

customer_reviews.title: Does fine for a cheap mower
customer_reviews.text: This mower has served me well for 4 summers and I only recently had a problem. The bumper assembly on the front of the mower has plastic height adjustment knobs that have wore and recently just broke making it impossible for set the mower height at 3 of the 5 levels. I have found a replacement online for $20 but that is a pain in the butt to fix. Other than that the mower does well. Starts super easy.
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly very easy. Check in with me in a year
customer_reviews.text: As of 2 mows on my small lawn, starts very well. Assembly very easy. Check in with me in a year, for an update. Thanks Amazon, good deal on a great mower.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Legassey

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this mower!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received the mower today, it came mostly pre-assembled. Finished assembly, started to mow and the first small dip in my yard caused the front wheels to collapse and the mower fell flat scalping my yard. Put the front wheels back in place and it happened right away. Do not ignore the bad reviews with this issue. Major design flaw!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Monty64014

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: This product starts up on the first or 2nd pull. I have used it 3 times and it’s a beast. I’ve had no issues with it at all. I’ve not used the bagger portion as it’s also a mulcher as well. The self propelled portion works very well in that it makes cutting the grass soooo much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Gates

customer_reviews.title: Muchess up great.
customer_reviews.text: Best one ever. I got arthritis, and the electric start is awesome and turns engine over fast. One thing that would make it perfect, if they gear down on the self-propelled a little slower. I use a scooter, and have to push to cut grass. It goes to fast for a person on a scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Junk, just absolute garbage. Difficult to start, single speed self propelled mechanism is not adjustable and is weak without enough power to cut grass. Do not waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: This mower seems to work ok, but isn’t as powerful as I would have liked. It has a hard time with longer grass and requires frequent adjustments. I also don’t like how it didn’t include the side discharge like stated on the description.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Levy

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: An excellent machine. Almost always starts with one easy pull. Relatively quiet. The only issue I've had is that I had to duck tape the front-wheel elevation device as it wouldn't stay in the preset holes.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Echols

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Lawn Boys for the last 30 years! The only machine that works for us! Other machines are hard to use and are too heavy to move around! Would highly rercommenf.
customer_reviews.author: me crochet!

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The lawn mower does not start reliably. Once it warms up it takes a lot of effort to get it restarted. The grass catcher does not catch much grass. It will catch one or two yard strip passes before stopping catching and leaving it on your lawn. Between having to empty much more than other mowers and then it not restarting well afterwards I would not recommend this mower to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whetstone

customer_reviews.title: Starts easy and works great
customer_reviews.text: Good mower. We use it for trim. We have a big yard and use a riding mower for most of it. This is a little heavy to pull backwards and cut around objects but I don't think that is what it is designed for. It is a good mower so far.
customer_reviews.author: jerryd

customer_reviews.title: 1-2 pull Guarantee only good if you're close to a service provider
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this mower is that it doesn't start every time. And when it does, don't shut it off until you're done because it may not start again. I bought it because of the 1-2 pull guarantee but I'm 3 hours away from a Lawnboy service provider and they have to certify it doesn't work before I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good service
customer_reviews.text: Like the rear wheel drive for up hill. Actually,the mower wouldn't start the second time I needed to mow. I may have flooded it by mowing a lot on an angle,but IDK. Anyway,it was still inside its 30 day return. I called up, no questions asked,they offered me a refund or replacement so I am going with the replacement because I like the mower. So Great service by Amazon (unlike best buy,who wouldn't take back my computer even though it was under 30 days because they said there was a scratch. Only buying machines on Amazon from now on
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gillett

customer_reviews.title: Height adjustment design flaw! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: The rear cutting height adjustment failed after one season . This as many others have stated is a major defect in this mower. After 5 uses one of the height adjustment studs broke off...now on the 2nd season of normal use 3 more broke off! Metal studs into flimsy plastic at a critical section on the Mower is very a poor design flaw. I would return this mower but it past amazons prime return window. Very disappointed ,buyer beware! Law boy do right by either making a All metal ,NOT plastic relacement part..or give our money back!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if your lawn is completely flat
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these already this summer. The first one broke when it went over a small dip in our lawn and the flimsy plastic holding it together snapped and the tire went into the motor to get torn up and destroyed the motor in 10 seconds. Since I believed that to be my fault I bought a second one as a replacement because the self- propelled feature was nice. The second one came defective and it was explained to me that if I continue to use it the rods will crack and I could get injured.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lawnmower. No problems
customer_reviews.text: Great lawnmower. No problems. Not even damp morning dew grass. I've used lawn boys in the past and I'm still not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Artie

customer_reviews.title: ... upside down or oil goes into the motor would like a call
customer_reviews.text: mower was ruined du to being place upside down and oil went into the engine iit needed to be mark on outside of box not to be turn upside down but keep mower with a sign that says keep top up would order again if it could be shipped proper you can not turn mower upside down or oil goes into the motor would like a call back
customer_reviews.author: eleanor rohs

customer_reviews.title: Great at first.
customer_reviews.text: Worked wonderfully for about three weeks before it started making a loud rattling noise and dying down on thin grass. The rip cord broke off as well. Should be easy fixes, but I expected more for my money. When it works, it is great though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace the lawnmower stolen from in front of my house. I looked around for about a month, labor day was coming I knew they were going to go on sale, came across this model it looked perfect and perfect for the price. it's been 3 wks and works great. only bad thing I can say would be, why make the bag white??? make it black or green... yea, if that's the only bad thing it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lacombe

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: first of all it came ahead of time. It was supposed to come on Saturday and it came on a Friday Friday morning. That's such a plus. Second of all the only reason why it was Heavy it's because it's a lawn mower.. Not heavy as I can't handle it myself but heavy and general. Once it was assembled it seem more lightweight. All I can say is is it was a perfect purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Junk after 3 years!
customer_reviews.text: going on 3rd summer in use and the drive shaft broke and the drive wheels only work when they want to! this is junk! if i knew 3 years ago this would happen i would of paid extra and buy a better mower.
customer_reviews.author: Crude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Have a hill that our riding lawn mower can't mow so we bought this to try. Very satisfied the rear wheel drive is great. Mows great does exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Mowed twice and self propel mode quit
customer_reviews.text: Amazon won't accept the return - referred to manufacturer. Mowed twice and self-propel would no longer work. Have read reviews stating the same. I trusted Amazon and I trusted Lawn Boy - junk. Now I have to haul it to a dealer with receipt to see if it's covered by the warranty. Many complaints about Walmart but they would have accepted the return - no questions asked. Last time I buy a large item from Amazon - am a single woman in her sixties and now have to pick up the mower and haul to dealer. Not a happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie =Carrollton

customer_reviews.title: I'll Stick WIth Lawn Boy
customer_reviews.text: Assembled in minutes. Bought to replace another Lawn Boy I had for about 30 years, this Lawn Boy will last just as long. Great product. Easy start. No oil changes, no priming. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Peach

customer_reviews.title: Cuts clean. Self propel speed gets the job done ...
customer_reviews.text: Cuts clean. Self propel speed gets the job done fast. Electric start saves my back and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: John Slomnicki

customer_reviews.title: Love to go on walks with this mower
customer_reviews.text: It pulls itself, so I get exercise walking behind it. Easy to bag. Easy everything. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Hubris

customer_reviews.title: Works but arrived missing screw - needs speed control
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a few months but so far so good. My only two complaints are that it moves way too fast (pulls me along!) which can be good in that the power is great but not so good when you're running after it. The other complain is that one of the screws for the handle was missing so I had to put it together using some I had around the house. It works though and starts easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie4184

customer_reviews.title: Highly NOT RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to start and impossible to restart. Mower not overheating, poor throttle movement. Mower needs to sit hours if not a day to restart. Bag door is plastic and fits poorly to bag, blow out over bag constant. My 80 year old reel mower finishes every mow.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Tavares

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this lawn mover. When it arrived I was concerned about assembly but to my surprise the only thing that needed to be assembled was the handle! Add the oil, gas, hit the prime button 6 times (although the directions said 4) and 2 pulls of the cord and we were up and running! My backyard has quite a hill and the drive has made this so much easier this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: self-propelled that still works great. Not sure how to return a mower from ...
customer_reviews.text: I put one tank of fuel in this mower and the self propelled quit working. I still have a 30+ year old, two stroke, self-propelled that still works great. Not sure how to return a mower from prime and have to pay for hefty shipping. Unbelievable this mower shot craps already. I sincerely hope I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Pro's and Con's
customer_reviews.text: Pro's - adjustable speed is nice, pulls up slopes nicely, easy to walk behind. Adjustable deck is great, mulches well. Con's - not great for use where you need to cut back & forth around things - kinda heavy to pull back - works best in larger open areas. - takes several pulls to start - will see if that improves. - out of the box it was missing the left side handle frame bolt - had to run to the hardware store to get replacement - ticked me off a little.
customer_reviews.author: MPF

product_meta.title: Lawn-Boy 17732 21-Inch 6.5 Gross Torque Kohler XTX OHV, 3-in-1 Discharge Rear Wheel Drive Self Propelled Lawn Mower
product_meta.description: Size:Self Propeled21 in. Rear Wheel Drive Self-Propelled Gas Lawn Mower with Kohler Engine. For homeowners seeking a reliable mower that is budget-friendly and has features that make mowing easier. Lawn-Boy is Easy to Handle, but Hard to Beat. Wheel dimensions- 7 inches Front / 8 inches rear.
feature_bullets: Rear Wheel Drive System provides a better traction and control on hilly terrain
2-Point Height-of-Cut System allows you to quickly adjust cutting heights from one side of the mower. Height of Cut- 6 Position 1.25 – 3.75 inches. Cutting Width- 21 inch
3 year Tru-Start Commitment - starts with 1 or 2 pulls or Lawn-Boy will fix it for free
Kohler 149cc/ 6.5 ft.-lbs. Gross Torque/ OHV Engine
CARB Compliant for the state of California

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,018 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
